name: Jewel Match Aquascapes 2 Collector's Edition
description:
Set off on an enchanting Match-3 journey into an underwater realm where the everyday fades away! Explore a mesmerizing aquatic world filled with intricate Match-3 challenges that will lead you through vibrant coral gardens and beautiful submerged landscapes.

As you journey deeper, collect gleaming treasures to revive a majestic undersea estate to its former glory. Delve into the captivating depths, where mind-bending puzzles, engaging spot-the-difference scenes, and intricate jigsaw puzzles await, providing you with essential resources. Gear up at the store, equipping yourself with a range of mighty power-ups to aid your odyssey into the boundless ocean.

Discover a plethora of novel gameplay elements, including submarines, formidable walls, dynamic conveyor belts, cunning octopuses, and much more! Immerse yourself in the soothing melodies of a delightful, ambient soundtrack as you navigate the extensive array of Match-3 challenges. Your aquatic adventure beckons in "Jewel Match Aquascapes" - a world where tranquility meets thrilling puzzles!

  • Journey through 200 expansive levels!
  • Dive into 50 additional bonus levels with new game features!
  • Choose from 3 distinct play modes: timed, relaxed, and limited moves!
  • Tailor your experience with 3 difficulty settings: normal, advanced and extreme.
  • Enhance your gameplay with an array of upgrades and powerful boosts available in the in-game shop.
  • Enjoy replayable mini-games, including engaging jigsaw puzzles and captivating spot-the-difference scenes.
